author: davidwalter2
body:
#### PR description:

Currently, the era modifier "run2_HLTconditions_2018" is used when running on Run 3 data which defines the wrong trigger filter key for the ZCounting module. This PR fixes this issue such that the correct trigger filter key is taken.

- Added a new era modifier for the Run 3 HLT conditions in the new file [Configuration/Eras/python/Modifier_run3_HLTconditions_cff.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...davidwalter2:cmssw:master#diff-2ee612d4d87e28128c82e78bd57504f1e8fdf88e98a8cbcf520cc9327cbbab60)

- Use this era modifier for Run 3 in [Configuration/Eras/python/Era_Run3_cff.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...davidwalter2:cmssw:master#diff-bdce97c132f2495fedca6f8c58fe085659f25973341a407fff38d404b804c9bc)

- Use this era modifier in the Z counting configuration [DQMOffline/Lumi/python/ZCounting_cff.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...davidwalter2:cmssw:master#diff-e95da84091cdbbe20566f45e73617b01dd6105fe396b715be347ac5c9e7e1149)

#### PR validation:

The updates were tested in CMSSW_12_4 using the cmsDriver.py 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is meant to be backported to CMSSW_12_4_X and CMSSW_12_5_X
title: Add Era modifier for Run 3 HLT conditions
